title: IRayTraceRendererOptions.HasCartoonShading
description: Gets or sets whether to render with cartoon shading.
returns: True to render with cartoon shading, false to not
remarks:
This property is only available when
IRayTraceRendererOptions::ContourCartoonRenderingEnabled
is true and
IRayTraceRendererOptions::RenderType
is swRayTraceRenderingType_e.swRayTraceCartoon.
To set cartoon...
Set
IRayTraceRendererOptions::HasCartoonEdges
to...
Set IRayTraceRendererOptions::HasCartoonShading to...
Edges
True
False
Shading
False
True
Edges and shading
True
True
